name: Temporal Firestorm

rulings.text: You may kick Temporal Firestorm only once for its {1}{W} cost and only once for its {1}{U} cost. You can kick it twice by paying {2}{W}{U}, but you can’t kick it twice by paying {2}{W}{W} or {2}{U}{U}. You can’t kick it more than twice. Notably, this means that X will always be either one or two if Temporal Firestorm was kicked.

text:
Kicker {1}{W} and/or {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{W} and/or {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Choose up to X creatures and/or planeswalkers you control, where X is the number of times this spell was kicked. Those permanents phase out.
Temporal Firestorm deals 5 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.
